tinyChat - is text-chat with video background. No voice. Chat at public spaces. Chat at night. Chat with your lovers. Chat with your friends.

Show your chat-partner your actual emotions. No more (heart), (thumb up), (smile), (kiss), (hug).

Heavily inspired byKevin Rose’s‘tiny’ concept, tinyChat is here to finally bring something real to text-chatting.

Sorry but sometimes it might not work. If it works you will see your partner's video. Something likethis.

Tweet

For geeks

tinyChat is WebRTC text-chat with background video (no-voice). It's just for two people and completely anonymous. Don't need any registration, usersnames, passwords. No history. Chat itself works without server. It's peer to peer communication between two browsers.

Sometimes demo might not work because of: browser version, operating system, network issues and who knows what else.

Technologies:

  • GoInstant,
  • WebRTC,
  • SVG,
  • CSS filters,
  • grunt,
  • underscore.js,
  • page.js,
  • drags.js ,
  • jquery,
  • uuid,
  • jade,
  • stylus,
  • nib.

Developed byHashobject teamforStaticshowdown Hackathon.

You need to allow camera access first and then invite someone to this chat
You need partner to chat with.
Send an invite or just copy url.
Your video. This is what other person is seeing.
